name: Skillet-Braised Brussels Sprouts with Bacon & Onions
ingredients: 2 ounces onion, coarsely chopped (a generous 1/3 cup)
1 pound fresh Brussels sprouts (about 12 ounces after trimming)

instructions.en: Trim stem ends and discolored leaves from Brussels sprouts, then cut in half through the stem
instructions.sk: Odrežte konce stoniek a sfarbené listy z ružičkového kelu, potom ich prekrojte na polovicu cez stonku
instructions.ja: 芽キャベツの茎の端と変色した葉を取り除き、茎を通して半分に切る

instructions.en: Cook chopped bacon and onion in a 12-inch skillet over medium-low heat until bacon is crisp and onion is browned
instructions.sk: Varte nasekanú slaninu a cibuľu na 30 cm panvici na stredne nízkom ohni, kým slanina nebude chrumkavá a cibuľa zhnedne
instructions.ja: 30cmのフライパンで中低温で刻んだベーコンと玉ねぎを、ベーコンがカリカリになり玉ねぎが茶色くなるまで調理する

instructions.en: Drain cooked bacon and onion on a paper towel lined plate
instructions.sk: Sceďte uvarenú slaninu a cibuľu na tanieri vystlanom papierovou utierkou
instructions.ja: 調理したベーコンと玉ねぎをペーパータオルを敷いた皿に取り出す

instructions.en: Add Brussels sprouts, water, and 1/2 teaspoon salt to the skillet; increase heat to medium
instructions.sk: Pridajte ružičkový kel, vodu a 1/2 lyžičky soli do panvice; zvýšte teplotu na strednú
instructions.ja: フライパンに芽キャベツ、水、塩小さじ1/2を加え、中火にする

instructions.en: Cover and simmer until Brussels sprouts are bright green, about 5-6 minutes
instructions.sk: Prikryte a varte, kým ružičkový kel nezjasnie, asi 5-6 minút
instructions.ja: 蓋をして芽キャベツが鮮やかな緑色になるまで約5〜6分煮る

instructions.en: Uncover and cook until liquid has evaporated and sprouts are tender, about 3 minutes
instructions.sk: Odkryte a varte, kým sa tekutina neodparí a kel nezmäkne, asi 3 minúty
instructions.ja: 蓋を取り、液体が蒸発し芽キャベツが柔らかくなるまで約3分調理する

instructions.en: Turn off heat and stir in bacon, butter, and vinegar
instructions.sk: Vypnite oheň a vmiešajte slaninu, maslo a ocot
instructions.ja: 火を止め、ベーコン、バター、酢を混ぜ込む

instructions.en: Season to taste with salt and pepper
instructions.sk: Dochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti
instructions.ja: 塩コショウで味を調える
